name: Head On
overview: Race around the concentric tracks and pick up the pac-man style dots without hitting the computer vehicle. Your car moves forward around the race track. You can move up, down, right and left. Try to score points by running over the dots on the track. Watch out for the crusher - if you crash you lose a car. Four cars and bonus levels. Full color graphics and sound. Fast action and very addicting. 9 levels of play.
